title: Kingdom Hearts 1.5 HD ReMIX
description: Contains Kingdom Hearts Final Mix, Kingdom Hearts ReChain of Memories, and a compilation of HD cutscenes from Kingdom Hearts 358/2 Days.

title: Kingdom Hearts 2.5 HD ReMIX
description: Contains Kingdom Hearts II Final Mix, Kingdom Hearts Birth by Sleep Final Mix, and a compilation of HD cutscenes from Kingdom Hearts ReCoded.

title: Kingdom Hearts HD 2.8 Final Chapter Prologue
description: Contains Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance HD, Kingdom Hearts 0.2 Birth by Sleep -A Fragmentary Passage-, and Kingdom Hearts χ Back Cover.

title: Kingdom Hearts 1.5 + 2.5 HD ReMIX
description: Contains Kingdom Hearts 1.5 HD ReMIX and Kingdom Hearts 2.5 HD ReMIX.

title: Kingdom Hearts - The Story So Far
description: Contains Kingdom Hearts 1.5 + 2.5 HD ReMix and Kingdom Hearts HD 2.8 Final Chapter Prologue.

title: Kingdom Hearts All-in-One Package
description: Contains Kingdom Hearts 1.5 + 2.5 HD ReMIX, Kingdom Hearts HD 2.8 Final Chapter Prologue, and the base game of Kingdom Hearts III.

title: Kingdom Hearts Integrum Masterpiece
release_date_WW: Was never released in other regions
description: Contains Kingdom Hearts 1.5 + 2.5 HD ReMIX, Kingdom Hearts HD 2.8 Final Chapter Prologue, Kingdom Hearts III + ReMind DLC. On Nintendo Switch this is available to purchase through digital download and cloud gaming. On Steam each collection and KH3 + ReMind can be bought separately.
